content.title: Agriculture Engineering (Mechanical) Scheme
content.department: Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya
content.details: The “Agriculture Engineering (Mechanical) Scheme” is a State Plan Scheme, which is implemented by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya. The objective of the scheme is to provide agricultural machinery such as power tillers/bulldozers/tractors etc. on hiring at subsidised rate.
benefits: Providing a 60% subsidy for the purchase of improved farm machinery and equipment (Proposed for Power Tiller and Diesel Water Pumpset).
Subsidy for hiring of farm machinery and equipment.
eligibility: The applicant should be a resident of Meghalaya.
The applicant should be a bonafide farmer engaged in agriculture.
content.application_process: The eligible bonafide farmer can apply/write an application on plain paper. Along with the application, attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required). Submit the duly filled and signed application along with the relevant documents at the nearest office of the Agriculture Development Officer of a CD Block/Agriculture Circle. The bonafide farmers shall be selected on a first come first serve basis.
documents_required: Documents proof of being a farmer

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective of the scheme is to provide agricultural machinery such as power tillers/ bulldozers/ tractors etc. on hiring at subsidised rate.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers of Meghalaya who are engaged in agriculture can apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the pattern of assistance?
faqs.answer: Providing a 50% subsidy for the purchase of improved farm machinery and equipment (Proposed for Power Tiller and Diesel Water Pumpset).

faqs.question: What is the type of assistance/service?
faqs.answer: Subsidy for hiring of farm machinery and equipment.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers can apply in plain paper through the nearest Agriculture Development Officer of a CD Block/Agriculture Circle.

faqs.question: What is the beneficiaries’ selection procedure?
faqs.answer: Selection of farmers on first come first basis.
